definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">Player joins the world</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get_logic"><field name="VAR">global:First_Join</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/give @p patchouli:guide_book{"patchouli:book":"michrosia:michrosia_guide"}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="variables_set_logic"><field name="VAR">global:First_Join</field><value name="VAL"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
